channel.title: Command for saving all Char's Profiles
channel.description: I am restarting my server a lot to update things and I would like to know if anyone can possibly give me a command to save everyone's profiles on my Server before I restart... BTW I am on PimpScape.

item.title: Command for saving all Char's Profiles
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“Zenzie, post:4, topic:76001”] if (command.startsWith("saveall") } savemoreinfo(); } break;Okay thanks… But I think you forgot you don’t need a break; for commands lol, atleast as long as their not in cases.

try ^^[/quote]

Read full topic
item.source: Command for saving all Char's Profiles

if (command.startsWith("saveall") } savemoreinfo(); } break;

try ^^

item.title: Command for saving all Char's Profiles

item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“Zzz O zzZ, post:2, topic:76001”]Lol…not sure if this would work but just copy the folder. Put it somewhere else for now…restart server and paste all the names back into the new folder?

Might not work, i dunno just a thought.[/quote]Umm NTY… lol
